sentences.sContent: Your report last week was unfair. It was based upon wholly unfounded and totally unjustified allegations.
sentences.sCn: 你上周的报告是不公正的，它基于毫无事实根据和完全无正当理由的指控。

synos.tran: 不正当的；未被证明其正确的

trans.tranCn: 不正当的；未被证明其正确的
trans.tranOther: If you describe a belief or action as unjustified, you think that there is no good reason for having it or doing it
